casebody.data:
Omlor, Exrx., Appellant, v. Riddle et al.; Carmel’s Mexican Restaurant, Appellee. (No. 88-2198 Submitted February 21, 1989 Decided April 5, 1989.) Green, Ashley & Weglian and Merritt W. Green II, for appellant. Baran, Piper, Tarkowsky & Fitzgerald Co., L.P.A., and Robert B. Fitzgerald, for appellee. Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Re snick, J., not participating.

[Cite as Omlor v. Riddle (1989), 42 Ohio St. 3d 16.]
